
{{Client function}}

Gets the current voice of a ped.

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">string string getPedVoice ( ped thePed )</syntaxhighlight>

===Required Arguments===
*'''thePed:''' the ped to get the voice of.

===Returns===
If successul, returns the current voice type name and the voice name of the ped (see [[/ped voices.md|ped voices]] for possible names). Returns ''false'' in case of failure.
